'Trump is a threat to our nation’: Hundreds of ex-staffers under George W. Bush endorse Biden Kristopher Purcell, a member of 43 Alumni for Biden, explains why hundreds of Republican ex-staffers under George W. Bush are coming together to endorse Joe Biden and says, “Donald Trump is a threat to our nation.”

On Fourth of July weekend, Biden projects optimism against Trump's 'dystopia of fascism' Joe Biden sends a Fourth of July message in response to President Trump’s Mount Rushmore speech. He warns President Trump could dismantle democracy if he is re-elected, MSNBC’s Betsy Woodruff Swan reports.
